articles.author: Simon Cambers, Tom Hamilton, D'Arcy Maine
articles.title: Iga Swiatek wins French Open, bests Coco Gauff in women's final - ESPN
articles.description: On Saturday, world No. 1 Iga Swiatek beat rising American star Coco Gauff in the French Open final. Updates on all the action as it happened.
articles.content:
PARIS -- After two weeks of play at Roland Garros, world No. 1 Iga Swiatek and 18-year-old American Coco Gauff met for the title.
Swiatek, the 2020 French Open champion, got her consecutive win No. … [+8559 chars]

articles.author: Harry Robertson
articles.title: A US recession won't happen, as consumer too strong, strategist says - Markets Insider
articles.description: Americans have built up trillions of dollars in savings, and are now switching their spending to services, which is less inflationary, Truist's Mike Skordeles said.
articles.content:
At the end of last year, almost nobody was talking about a US 
recession. Now, the dreaded 'R' word is on everybody's lips.
A consensus is building on Wall Street that US economic growth is soon li… [+3257 chars]
